mapper.select: /* 세션정보 생성 위한 user 상세정보 조회 sql-login.xml / irisLogin / retrieveUserDetail */ SELECT sa_user ,TA.sa_sabun ,TA.sa_sabun_new ,TA.sa_gubun ,TA.sa_name ,TA.sa_dept ,TA.sa_dept_name ,TA.sa_jobx ,TA.sa_jobx_name ,TA.sa_func ,TA.sa_func_name ,TA.sa_mail ,(CASE WHEN LEADER_CNT = 0 THEN (SELECT SD.dept_uper FROM IRIS_SSO_DEPT SD WHERE SD.dept_code = TA.sa_dept) ELSE TA.sa_dept END ) AS team_dept FROM ( SELECT SU.sa_user ,SU.sa_sabun_new as 'sa_sabun' ,SU.sa_sabun_new /*[EAM추가]*/ ,substring(SU.sa_sabun_new, 1, 1) sa_gubun ,SU.sa_name ,SU.sa_dept_new as 'sa_dept' ,SU.sa_dept_name ,SU.sa_jobx ,SU.sa_jobx_name ,SU.sa_func ,SU.sa_func_name ,SU.sa_mail ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 WHERE su.sso_ex_flag != 'D' AND SU2.sa_dept_new = SU.SA_DEPT_NEW AND SU2.sa_func IN ('FO0','FG0','FB1', 'FQ0') ) AS LEADER_CNT FROM IRIS_SSO_USER SU WHERE SU.SA_USER = #{sa_user} AND su.sso_ex_flag != 'D' ) TA
